name: d3-source-sink
description: D3 plugin that generates a source to sink graph for following flow.  Similar to a Sankey Visualization.

scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -f umd -n d3 -o build/d3-source-sink.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/d3-source-sink.js -c -m -o build/d3-source-sink.min.js
scripts.postpublish: zip -j build/d3-source-sink.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-source-sink.js build/d3-source-sink.min.js

author: Matt Gibbs <matt@mtgibbs.xyz> (http://mtgibbs.xyz)
